wikipedia_page.main:
Henry David Erskine, 12th Earl of Buchan (July 1783 – 13 September 1857) was the grandson of the 10th Earl of Buchan.
On 28 September 1809 he married Elizabeth Cole Shipley (d.1828), daughter of Major-General Sir Charles Shipley. They had one child, David Stuart Erskine, 13th Earl of Buchan (1815–1898).In 1833 he was living at 47 Minto Street in southern Edinburgh.

response: *Henry Erskine (b. 1 November 1746; d.1817), the father of Henry Erskine, 12th Earl of Buchan
